name: Total blade
description:
Overworld
Players can visit villages on the world map to recruit soldiers and engage in battles against enemy armies in the field.


Battle
Players directly participate in 3D battles and can simultaneously control over a hundred allied soldiers.


Soldier tree
All soldiers have their own upgrade trees
Special soldiers like giants or deer riders can also be used

Quests and Choices
The rewards and effect of sub-quests vary depending on the choices made. The main quest is linear

Cargo bay
The player can travel the world with foods and trade goods loaded in cargo Bay
